summary: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.
cast: Tim Allen|Sigourney Weaver|Alan Rickman|Tony Shalhoub|Sam Rockwell|Daryl Mitchell|Enrico Colantoni|Robin Sachs|Patrick Breen|Missi Pyle|Jed Rees|Justin Long|Jeremy Howard|Kaitlin Cullum|Jonathan Feyer|Corbin Bleu|Wayne Pére|Sam Lloyd|Bill Chott|Morgan Rusler|Gregg Binkley|Brandon de Paul|Paul G. Kubiak|Gregory Colbrook|Jennifer Manley|John Patrick White|Todd Giebenhain|J.P. Manoux|Dan Gunther|Matt Winston|Brandon Keener|Dian Bachar|Rainn Wilson|Susan Egan|Heidi Swedberg|Isaac C. Singleton Jr.|Jerry Penacoli|Joel McKinnon Miller|Kevin McDonald|Daniel Parker|Dawn Hutchins|Joe Frank|Larry Richards|Mic Tomasi|Heath Castor|Mike J Daugherity|Joseph J. Dawson|Paulie DiCocco III|David Dorfman|Andrew Doucette|Michael Haboush|Linda Harcharic|Erik Johnson|Janis Jones|Danilo Mancinelli|Paul McMichael|Molly O'Brien|Brian Penikas|Marcio Rosario|Rocco Salata
title: Héroes fuera de órbita
